response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $800,000. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price. Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a rare opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
